name: Please obliterate me Mr. Demon Lord!
name_original: Please obliterate me Mr. Demon Lord!
description:
Short metroidvania platformer. Made for GDL game jam with theme "Death in not the end.. death is progress".

Controls: Space to jump, wasd to move or use joystick.

Credits:

Art by https://rottingpixels.itch.io

Demon art by Redshrike (Contributor: William.Thompsonj)

Music by Fato Shadow (https://opengameart.org/users/fatoshadow)
